H0.text: A physical change is playing piano, as demonstrated by both a boy and his sister.

H1.text: An inherited trait is an example of playing piano, as demonstrated by a boy and his sister who both play the instrument.

H2.text: A life function is playing piano, as demonstrated by a boy and his sister who both play piano.

H3.text: A learned behavior is playing piano for a boy and his sister who both play piano.

A4.text: The learning of an instrument increases fine motor skills in students with physical disabilities.

A5.text: Using intensive music curriculum as an intervention paired alongside regular classroom activities, research shows that students involved with the music curriculum show increases in reading comprehension, word knowledge, vocabulary recall, and word decoding.
